description: The image captures a playful moment where a man, wearing a flat cap and a blue jacket, has a colorful parrot perched on his head. He is inside a structure with a wooden background and other parrots are visible around, one on a branch and another in the background. The man looks amused by the situation, giving a slight smirk. This candid scene likely takes place in an aviary or a similar setting where birds are free to interact closely with visitors.
poem:
There once was a man with a cap,
Who found a parrot to nap,
On his head it sat tight,
In the soft fading light,
And together they made quite the snap.
